title: Motor Trend FlexTough Performance All Weather Rubber Car Floor Mats - 3 Piece Floor Mats Automotive Liners for Cars Truck SUV, Heavy-Duty Waterproof (Black)
description: Motor Trend mats are manufactured with the highest quality and safest material. means you and your family don't need to worry about toxins and odors that other rubber mats emit. These Motor Trend licensed products give your floor All-Weather protection and keeps your car free from any messes from spills, loose dirt, or water. These mats are made of rubber, the same safe materials as baby pacifiers, which means they are safe, and odor-less. You no longer have to worry about the strong rubber odors which make you dizzy and uncomfortable. Rated as non-toxic, safe and by CGS labs. These rubber mats are easily trimmable to accommodate pedal placement and any necessary customization. Superior quality - minimal maintenance - .
